name: 0xDEFCAFE
description: 0XDEFCAFE developing a universal trading solution that consolidates most decentralized exchanges, offering users a simple and convenient interface for token trading. CAFE is the native utility token that is used for revenue share. 0XDEFCAFE tools include: * Fast Trading Terminal - combines features traditional to stock markets (e.g., limit orders, trailing and traditional stop-loss, on-chart trading) with features needed in DeFi (e.g., fast private nodes, gas prediction based on machine learning, MEV-protection, launch buying tools). * Bridge0 - free to use bridge for ERC20 tokens with built-in automatic price balancing features and convenient manual arbitrage. * Wallet vault embedded in Fast Trading Terminal with ability to export wallets. * Staking platform as a revenue sharing mechanism.
